data: ED DTU Pyelonephritis (Module)
Admit/Transfer/Discharge

DTU Eligibility Criteria:  
Inclusion Criteria (ALL must apply):  
- Results of initial investigations consistent with diagnosis of pyelonephritis (consider alternative diagnosis if urinalysis negative)  
- Stable vital signs  
- Unable to tolerate oral medications  
- Observation or treatment of greater than 4 hours required, but anticipate discharge
- Able to mobilize with assistance    

Exclusion Criteria (ANY may apply):  
- Signs of septic shock: SBP less than 90 mmHg (female) or less than 100 mmHg (male)  
- Known obstructive uropathy  
- Urine output less than 30 mL/hour  
- Pregnancy  
- Severe or advanced immunocompromised state
